130070000.text: My dearest outworlder friend, I am the esteemed Vidyadhara High Elder. I was wounded by abominations and have been in dormancy for a thousand years. I only awakened very recently and plan to restore the glory of the Vidyadhara lineage. Unfortunately, I have lost all worldly possessions, and currently find myself in financial shortfall. So, I was hoping you could lend me 50,000 credits. Once I return to the Xianzhou, I'll pay you back tenfold and even let you choose anything you desire from our precious Vidyadhara treasures.

130070001.text: There are so many High Elders on the Xianzhou. Who exactly are you? Tell me your name, and maybe it's someone I know.

130070002.text: Well, I'd rather not reveal my identity to avoid drawing unwanted attention. After all, I'm not on the Xianzhou.

130070003.text: Come on, why be a stranger? Just tell me if you need money! We're best buddies, aren't we?

130070004.text: Why using a sockpuppet? Just log in to your main account, and we can talk.

130070005.text: But this is my main account.

130070006.text: You're not on the Xianzhou? Wait a sec. I think I know who you are. Hang on. I'm coming to say hi

130070008.text: Come on, what are you even thinking? Do you really believe 50,000 credits would be enough to socialize with the right people to restore glory for the entire Vidyadhara race!?
